remarks: Reverse isomorphism H of a closed subspace intersection.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dihmeet2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeet2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeet2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeet2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihmeet2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihmeet2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
dihmeet2 $p |- ( ph -> ( `' I ` ( X i^i Y ) ) = ( ( `' I ` X ) ./\ ( `' I ` Y ) ) ) $.
